data.name: Hairdresser Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Check out our other games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1120320/Builder_Simulator/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1510440/Honeycomb/


About the Game



Become a true master of hairdressing craft thanks to Hairdresser Simulator! Find the right place for your hair salon, and pay attention to every single detail to please your customers. Hire employees, improve your skills, and expand your spacious salon to become the best hairdresser on the globe. But be careful – even a single cut may lead to a total disaster.



Even if you've already managed to set up your business, you can't rest on your laurels. Learn new hairdressing techniques to increase your skills further. Stay up to date with current trends and buy new products for your demanding clients. Attend classes and workshops that will test your skills, and sooner or later, you will find yourself in the hair of fame.



If you plan to aim high in the hairdressing industry, you must pay attention to all the details. Just remember that attractive, competitive prices and a cozy atmosphere, even if important, will not let you climb to the top. You will have to make sure that you can use a variety of different hairdressing skills. Highlights, balayage, keratin hair straightening? Not every hairdresser can boast such an expanded range of services. What about you, hairdresser?

A giant salon in the wealthiest part of the city, celebrities showcasing their new hairstyles created by you, and a schedule filled up till next year – You've made it to the top! You're no longer a newbie in this industry; you're a maestro! Now it's your turn to dictate the latest trends!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3,20GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 955 3,2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 / AMD R7-260X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
